title: An Array of Arguments
intro: Looks like we're trying to put a square peg in a round hole.
hint: Check out the signature for Math.min. You may need to apply a different tactic.
success: Excellent! All functions have call and apply functions. They both execute the function and allow you to set the context of the this keyword. They differ in their signature. call accepts a list of arguments, while apply accepts an array.
